community.title: üë• MBTI Communities
community.welcome: Welcome {{userName}}! Connect with other {{mbtiType}} types and share your insights
community.live_description: Chat, share and learn from the full MET24 community via our Discourse platform
community.integration_notice: üîó Seamlessly integrated: Your MET24 profile and progress are automatically linked

mbti_questions.intro: Answer these questions to determine your MBTI type
mbti_questions.question_1: I prefer to recharge by spending time alone.
mbti_questions.question_2: I focus more on facts and details than patterns and possibilities.
mbti_questions.question_3: I usually make decisions based on logic rather than feeling.
mbti_questions.question_4: I like to plan things and prefer structure.
mbti_questions.question_5: I feel more energized after meeting new people.
mbti_questions.question_6: I rely on intuition to see future possibilities.
mbti_questions.question_7: In discussions, I seek truth even if it's uncomfortable.
mbti_questions.question_8: I find flexibility and openness more important than strict planning.
mbti_questions.question_9: I often notice details that others miss.
mbti_questions.question_10: I let my feelings and values influence my decisions.

questions.sleep: How regularly do you get enough sleep?
questions.fatigue: How often do you experience daytime fatigue?
questions.exercise: How often do you exercise moderately/intensively per week?
questions.stress: How well can you regulate your emotions under stress?
questions.meaning: How often do you experience meaning in daily activities?
questions.social_support: How much social support do you experience?
questions.physical_complaints: How often do you experience physical complaints that affect functioning?
questions.goal_oriented: How often do you act goal-oriented?

ai_coaching.title: ü§ñ AI Coaching
ai_coaching.description: Personal AI coaching adapted to your {{mbtiType}} type
ai_coaching.session_frequency: How often would you like AI coaching sessions?
